程序包 com.htsmart.wristband2.dial

类 DialView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • com.htsmart.wristband2.dial.DialView
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback
    public class DialView
extends android.view.View
    Used to show different dial backgrounds, styles, and positions. 1. Shape. setShape(DialDrawer.Shape) 2. Background ScaleType. setBackgroundScaleType(DialDrawer.ScaleType) 3. Style Position. setStylePosition(DialDrawer.Position) 4. Dial background bitmap. setBackgroundBitmap(Bitmap) 5. Dial style bitmap. setStyleBitmap(Bitmap)

    If you need to manage Bitmap resources externally, you can use setEngine(DialViewEngine) to set up a manager to load Bitmap, and use setBackgroundSource(Uri) and setStyleSource(Uri) to load bitmap.

    setCheckParams(boolean, int, int, int) and setChecked(boolean) will set a selected effect.

    The background bitmap and style bitmap can be any format and size picture. But dial bin file need RGB_565 format pictures and the size must match of dial shape. Your can use createActualBackground() and createActualPreview(int, int) to create the actual bitmap for bin file.

    Note:If you use R.styleable#DialView_dv_background_src And R.styleable#DialView_dv_style_src set default background and style bitmap. It is recommended to put related pictures into the drawable-nodpi directory, because the pictures related to the dial are designed according to specific sizes.

      • setStyleSource

        public void setStyleSource​(@NonNull
                           android.net.Uri uri,
                           int styleBaseOnWidth)
        Set Style uri
        参数:
        uri - The style uri
        styleBaseOnWidth - You must know how wide the dial width your style picture is based on.

      • setStyleBitmap

        @Deprecated
public void setStyleBitmap​(@NonNull
                           android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap)
        已过时。
        use setStyleBitmap(Bitmap, int) instead
        Set Style bitmap
        参数:
        bitmap - The style bitmap must be based on a dial with width of 800 pixels

      • setStyleBitmap

        public void setStyleBitmap​(@NonNull

        Set Style bitmap
        参数:
        bitmap - The style bitmap
        styleBaseOnWidth - You must know how wide the dial width your style picture is based on.
